name: Destroyer (Epyx)
overview: Destroyer is a naval combat simulation computer game released by Epyx in 1986. It was published for the Amiga, Apple II, Commodore 64, and IBM PC. Players take the role of a captain controlling a United States Navy Destroyer class vessel. During World War II, the player has to command several Destroyer operations: Subhunter missions Rescue missions Blockade runnings Bombardment missions Scout operations Convoy escort
